name: 2D Surgery Simulator
description:
Keep it alive! The patient of course!

A two-player game (or one if you are super skilled). One player per hand (or activate big brain multitasking), but you must do actions at the same time so make sure your friend isn’t holding the scalpel over patients open heart while you pick up the band aid. Follow the surgery task and keep the patient alive.

Controls:

Movement: P1: WASD , P2: Arrow Keys

Action: Spacebar

Clues and spoilers:

Task spoiler: The task is not completed until you patch the patient up.

*

Defibrillator spoiler:    Used on heart gives adds ten more seconds to the patients expected survival time.

*

Level 1 clue: A heart surgery won't fix this patient, but love will...

*

Level 1 spoiler: Put the chocolate in the patients mouth. 

*

Level 2 spoiler: The patient has four broken bones.

*

Level 3 spoiler: Kill the corona five times with the axe.
